about_the_game:
THE PREMISE
Chris Isn't Alone is a horror/comedy game where your choices actually have an effect on the outcome of the story.
You play as Chris, a 12 year old boy that has just come to the realization that the monster in his closet was real.
The monster informs you that they are there to kill you.
You must convince it otherwise.

CHOOSE YOUR OWN PATH
You will be presented with many different choices that WILL have an effect on the outcome of the story.
A story path that you may have gone down previously could end up changing depending on what items Chris has...

ENDINGS
There are a total of 17 unique endings!
Can you find the TRUE ending?
There is a reward for unlocking all the endings...

HOW TO PLAY
When you see text on the screen, you can Left Click to advance through the dialogue.
Players can use a mouse or trackpad.

PLEASE ENJOY!
Keep in mind that this is a student project!
Feedback would be amazing!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent imagery as well as descriptive violent text.
